comments.body:
@mattkrick @alloy Why did we remove `| undefined` here? It's what the upstream Flow types declare:

https://github.com/facebook/relay/blob/7fd936ac9eddb44b6f463affa03679a53a6d0561/packages/relay-runtime/store/RelayStoreTypes.js#L378
Hmm, yep indeed–my bad for forgetting about flow’s `?Foo` details.

ah, that's my bad, must've gotten a little too excited.
just outta curiosity, how do you get that to return undefined?? i thought the server spec only allowed null?

Oh, I don't know really whether it ever does. It's just marked as such in Flow. I only noticed because the removal of `undefined` here caused me to get type checking failures from different versions of this typing lib being installed.
